data.title:
Welcome to
HEI SCHOOLS SENAYAN!
data.description: HEI Schools Senayan is meticulously designed to encourage children to interact, explore, rest and unwind. To always find the joy of learning in every little detail, for there is always something to gain in every little step.

data.title: CLASS ARRANGEMENT
data.description:
Classes will gradually open starting with K1 and K2 in Juli 2025.

The other levels will be launched soon -- stay tuned!
data.link_description: Read the Students Cut-Off Ages for 2024-2025

data.title:
DAY AT HEI SCHOOLS
SENAYAN
data.description: This is a typical day at HEI Schools. Each day varies according to the curriculum activities. Our days have been designed with thought to have the right balance of lessons and free play, movement and rest, excitement and calmness, group activities and individual time indoors and outdoors.

items.title: S.T.E.A.M
items.description: Through STEAM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Art, and Math), little ones get to explore, create, and discover the world around them while having fun!

criterias.title: Starter Builder (2–3 years old)
criterias.description: In this class, our starter builders will use their imagination to create, construct, and explore with ease. Perfect for K1–K2 students.

criterias.title: Little Builder (3–4 years old)
criterias.description: In this class, our little builders will use their imagination to create, construct, and explore with ease. Perfect for K1–K2 students.

criterias.title: Engineer Explorers (4–6 years old)
criterias.description: In this class, our engineer explorers will build, tinker, and create hands-on projects that spark curiosity and problem-solving skills. Perfect for K1–K2 students.

items.title: Music
items.description: Music is an important part of a child’s development. It helps them express themselves, develop creativity, and build confidence. Our music classes are designed to be fun and engaging, and to help children develop a love for music.

items.title: Gymnastics
items.description: Gymnastics is a great way to improve a child’s physical and mental health. It helps them develop strength, balance, coordination, and flexibility. Our gymnastics classes are designed to be fun and engaging, and to help children develop a love for gymnastics.
